name: Broccoli Dal. Mung Bean and Lentil Stew with Broccoli and Mini Peppers. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
description: Broccoli Dal. Mung Bean and Lentil Stew with Broccoli and Mini Peppers. Sabut Masoor aur Sabut Mung Daal. Vegan Glutenfree soy-free Indian Dahl Recipe Serves 2 to 3
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup dry Whole Red Lentils/Indian Brown Lentils (Masoor)
1/2 cup dry Whole Mung/Moong beans (green gram)
2.5 cups of water (less for thicker stew)
a generous pinch of asafetida (hing - optional)
1/4 cup chopped sweet mini peppers or red bell pepper
Add Chipotle pepper flakes/powder for a smoky Dal.
Add a Tablespoon or so cashew cream to the dal before serving.

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the lentils+beans for atleast 2 hours to overnight in warm water. Drain the water and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the lentils+beans for atleast 2 hours to overnight in warm water. Drain the water and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker, add the oil and heat at medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker, add the oil and heat at medium.

recipeInstructions.text: When the oil is hot, add cumin seeds and let them get fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: When the oil is hot, add cumin seeds and let them get fragrant.

recipeInstructions.text: Add dried red chili, bay leaf, chopped onion and saute until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add dried red chili, bay leaf, chopped onion and saute until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asafetida(hing), coriander powder, garam masala, ginger and garlic and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asafetida(hing), coriander powder, garam masala, ginger and garlic and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped tomato. Cook for 3-4 minutes until tomato is mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped tomato. Cook for 3-4 minutes until tomato is mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add broccoli and mini peppers and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add broccoli and mini peppers and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the drained and washed lentils+beans, water and salt and pressure cook on medium heat for 3-4 whistles. (10 minutes at high pressure after the pressure has reached fo electric pressure cooker)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the drained and washed lentils+beans, water and salt and pressure cook on medium heat for 3-4 whistles. (10 minutes at high pressure after the pressure has reached fo electric pressure cooker)

recipeInstructions.text: Let the pressure release by itself before opening. Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the pressure release by itself before opening. Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro.

recipeInstructions.text: To refresh the daal, add a fresh tadka/tempering. heat oil, add mustard and cumin seeds and some red pepper flakes and pour over the daal.
recipeInstructions.name: To refresh the daal, add a fresh tadka/tempering. heat oil, add mustard and cumin seeds and some red pepper flakes and pour over the daal.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with Indian flat breads like Roti, Paratha , Naan, or with Rice, quinoa or pilafs. Or with crackers, bread. Thicker Dal can also be slathered on breads like hummus, or made into a sloppy sandwich with sweet peppers, slaw.
